-#  socket   - IOExceptions thrown by java.net.Socket and the socket types in the

-#             message information
+#  socket   - IOExceptions thrown by the java.net socket types (for example, Socket,
+#             ServerSocket, DatagramSocket) and the NetworkChannel types in the
+#             java.nio.channels package will contain enhanced exception message
+#             information
